bug.author: zaccharieramzi
bug.description:
The test for the scikit's gradient boosting multiclass classifier converter is failing with the following: <denchmark-code>FAIL: test_conversion (coremltools.test.test_boosted_trees_classifier.GradientBoostingMulticlassClassifierScikitTest) ---------------------------------------------------------------------- Traceback (most recent call last): File "/Users/zaccharieramzi/workspace/coremltools/coremltools/test/test_boosted_trees_classifier.py", line 130, in test_conversion self.assertEqual(len(tr.nodes), 15056) AssertionError: 15010 != 15056 </denchmark-code>
I am on mac OS 10.13 (I also just tried on 10.14, it's the same error).
